item.title: California Gov. Gavin Newsom sues Fox News for $787 million, alleging defamation
item.description: Fox News' corporate parent paid nearly the same amount to Dominion Voting Systems for a defamation lawsuit related to 2020 presidential election cover...

item.title: Trump ends all U.S. trade talks with Canada over digital services tax
item.description: Trump's announcement on Truth Social accused Canada of "copying the European Union" with the "egregious" tax.

item.title: Trump calls New York Democratic mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani 'a communist'
item.description: Some New York investors and business leaders are dismayed that democratic socialist Zohram Mamdani will become the next mayor of New York City.

item.title: Supreme Court limits judges' power to halt Trump's birthright citizenship order
item.description: The high court did not take up the underlying issue of whether President Donald Trump's order ending automatic birthright citizenship was constitution...

item.title: Europe will buy more American weapons and pave way for trade deal, EU Council chief says
item.description: NATO's agreement to boost defense spending has solved the main trade issue between the European Union and the U.S., EU's Antonio Costa told CNBC.
